p: SBTi’s website [37] lists only the most recent date of target approval for a given company, hence ignoring if a company had SBT(s) approved an earlier date, followed by later approval of revised SBT(s). Data on SBT revisions is not readily available, but SBTi’s assessment [36] (page 15) indicates a substantial growth in the number of targets approved annually over the 2015–2020 period, consistent with the pattern of Fig. 1.
